reviewText: Awesome case. Love it. It is not bulky yet is very protecting and it has a nice look. I love spigen products
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: It's a two part case really for no reason. You always cannot use the audio jack hole easily or the charging port.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case doesn't allow for the use of several chargers, other than the Samsung factory chargers. If you have only aftermarket chargers, you can trim some of the material from around the actual charger. I have been able to find an aftermarket car charger that will work, but others won't.Other than this issue, for the money, this is a decent case.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: My primary reason for leaving a review is to let those people that want to use a wireless charging receiver on the back of their phone know that this case is compatible. The back of the case is not hard plastic so it accommodates the ever so slight bulge from the receiver under the back cover of the phone.However, I will echo the other reviewers in saying that this case makes it difficult to use anything but the Samsung OEM charging cable. The thickness of the perimeter of the case causes the charging port to be "sunken in" ... could be a fatal flaw especially for those that don't use wireless charging and really need maximum compatibility with multiple charging cables.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I have to say, after owning several cases for the iphone 5, this is by far the best yet! It not only protects the phone, but enhances the look of it too! I have the white iphone and the infinity white case looks awesome on it. If your looking for a new case, then you should definitely give this one a shot.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Perfect case for you S4. It isn't bulky but it protects the phone and I like the non-slip backing. I wish you could purchase the outer bands separately so you can change up the colors.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Love the case, looks great and it's not too bulky.The sharp edge can be a bit of annoyance to the hand.The power button is not thick enough so when pushed it doesn't give that "click" like the volume rocker does. However, I put a small piece of tape over the inside of the power button and that gave enough clearance for that click feel.The clear coating on the side could be better though because after about a month, the clear coating is already peeling off so at some area it's just the matte white paint showing right now.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Nice case. What I really like about this case is that it's thin! I can't comment on its durability, but the rubber skin looks like it can absorb most of the shock if the phone is dropped. I do like the feeling of the material used on this case and I don't feel like it will slip out of my hand unexpectedly. The volume rocker and power button respond better than I expected, which was a relief. The case also provides a thick layer build on the back allowing some space between the surface, in which your phone may be on, and the camera lens; further protecting the phone lens from scratching. There is definitely an increase in weight when using this case, but you'll get used to it rather quickly. I also bought Spigens tempered glass nano screen protector and it's really an awesome addition if you're worried about scratching the screen. The nano protector cost around $30 (!!?), but I don't regret buying it and I highly recommend it.Conclusion: A quality case that will relieve you of dropping-your-new-phone worries.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I love this case. the only flaw is not being able to use the Samsung original chargers.I took off the bottom part of the case in order to charge until I purchase a car charger and an extra charger with smaller pin where it fits the case. problem solved and I'm happy.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Dante Red's Contrasting red and black looks nice. The case Makes the phone look squarish which is a look that I like. Has a lip around front of phone to help protect screen from scratches. I dont know if it has superior drop and shock protection because I have not dropped my phone yet; I get a feeling the case is more for looks than protection but like i said, i have not dropped my phone; packaging says drop/shock protection... I hope so.4/5 stars because at this point I am unsure of drop protection otherwise it would be a 5 / 5 star rating
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I'm going to be blunt... it is a GREAT looking case and fits quite well, but for $30? Just not worth it! It's a TPU soft case with a polycarb border, $30? REALLY! At the very most this case should be $15-20 MAX.If you're looking for something that looks good and are willing to pay for it, go for it.If you're looking for something to simply protect your phone, pass.Then again... I think most cases over $20 is a rip.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Fits snug, feels AWESOME, like it's from the factory. Someone who used my phone asked me if it was the new Galaxy S5 or something, because it makes the phone seem brand new. If they could replace the outer case with aluminum, it'd step this up another notch...but the plastic is fine. The buttons are top notch and feel like they are from the factory.I'm hoping these guys come out with something for the S5, because it will be the first case I buy.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: the case is absolutely fantastic, but the plastic at the bottom near the charging port is too thin on the S4 version and breaks if you take your case off often. I just broke my third, but I must say that Spigen support has been more than helpful. that being said they have remedied this issue on the S5 and note 3 variant.I always get comments when people think that my phone isn't in a case because the case is so sleek and seems so natural
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: It fits very well and still leaves the phone light and able to fit in your pocket.  Looks great and doesn't seem scratch or get dirty easily.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: It makes the Samsung GS4 look like a Apple Iphone, some design modification might be in order.Thank youBuyer
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: The case looked great, but the buttons were far too loose and the screen was constantly being turned on and off.  I returned it in exchange for another Spigen case that fit my needs. http://amzn.to/1h5Kn5E
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Bought this case for the bf and be absolutely loves it. Fits the phone like a glove. The only gripe is that it's a little difficult to remove and sometimes the phone's battery cover comes off when trying to remove the case. Also the case itself is a little thinner than expected...hopefully that doesn't compromise the safety of the phone.Nonetheless great case, has a lip and everything to prevent the screen from being damaged if the phone falls. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good, simple case for their S4.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case makes the GS4 look very slick! Hard to improve on a perfect phone, but this case really does and it protects well too.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: The Neo Hybrid Case is the best case I have had for a phone. It does not add bulk and it extremely comfortable on the phone. I got Red and Black for The Georgia Bulldogs!!  So Great color choices to pick from as well.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: My beef with this product is it looks nice but my Satin Silver surround broke after 3 weeks and nobody at Spigen bothered to email me back when I contacted them directly.  They do sell surrounds for the protective black tpu but the followup or lack thereof with the option to buy another Satin Silver outside surround for about $10 is astronomical considering I am within 30 days, back it will go but Amazon didn't sell it so Spigen has to contact me back... to date, nothing.I have had smart phones since inception, I've had about 20 different cases from manufacturers, ascetically, it looks great and I'd be happy if the place where you plug in the charger was not so cheap... it broke incidentally when I plugged in my factory charger into the slot and it was dark and caught it at just the wrong angle.. anyone who has a Samsung knows sometimes it can be cumbersome to get the charger in just right when you have a case cover and this one proved quite difficult to the point it ended up breaking one night, perhaps stress but I think I may have gotten a bad surround.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I really like the look of this case.  It fits very well and gives the Galaxy S4 a sharp, crisp look.  There are 2 issues however that have made me return it.  Like other posters reported, the hole for the USB connector will not fit most of my micro usb connectors because the hole is too small.  Second, it won't make contact with the USB when using a desktop charger dock.  It's really too bad, I otherwise liked the case.  If neither of these 2 issues relate to you then I recommend this case.  Come to find out Spigen doesn't participate in amazon's return shipping policy and if you don't like this you have to pay your own shipping....
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Haven't used it long.  Seems logical that it would help protect my phone.  Am concerned that case limits which chargers I can use.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case is great for people who don't need to much protection.  I am a very careful person and never drop my phone, so I am not worried about too much drop protection.  If you are the type of person who is worried about dropping your phone from 6 feet high on concrete, go check out one of those ugly, bulky cases.  I picked this case because it is slim, adds no bulk and actually makes the Galaxy S4 look better.  It has a lay on the table design and the tpu back is thick enough that the camera and flash lens are also safe from touching flat surfaces.  I also like the fact that it adds more grip to the phone.  The Galaxy S4 without a case is very slick and slippery. I personally think that this is the best case if you're trying to protect your phone from scratches, minor drops and want better grip.  Also the silver looks sexy with the black Galaxy because it picks up on the silver accents of the home button, camera ring, speakers and samsung symbol.  The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because I feel like they should have made the speaker cutout a little bit bigger.  It is such a perfect cutout that it will occasionally muffle the sound if laid on its back.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: One of the greatest cases I have ever bought!!!  Couldn't be happier!!! The fact that the band around the case is interchangeable is awesome!!!
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I already had a generic case on, I had a Otterbox sitting collecting dust, and I still bought this one. I use two non Samsung chargers, one near my bed is an 8 foot cable so I can use it while charging. The other is a spare I keep in my bag for those heavy usage days. Both of these non Samsung chargers didn't fit this case. I found myself taking it off or popping the bottom part out so I could get the phone charged. The point of a case is to keep things one, not on and off.BOTTOM LINE: iF YOU USE ANY NON SAMSUNG CHARGER FOR YOUR S4 DO NOT BUY THIS CASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!very stylish other than that though...UPDATE 4/14So with a few more weeks of use, I've come to some more conclusions. I still pop the case off ever night to charge it. But I've also been using the Samsung OEM charger around the house now, so I don't have to pop it off ALL the time. The reason that I raised the rating to 4 stars is because of the compliments I received on the case. Apparently its very easy on the eyes, so if you do only use those Samsung OEM chargers, you really will be happy!!!
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case adds to the hold-ability of my SG4, I don't have the slippery feeling of the phones backing and it doesn't give you any extra bulk. Logo is passive. All holes match up. The button extenders have a great feel.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I've tried many different cases for my phone, and gotta say that Spigen spg neo hybrid case is the far better case than others.First, easy to install phone inside, and take out.Secondly, give decent amount protection against scratches, and drop.Third, looks cool too
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: At first I was a little disappointed. The pictures really does make the case look a lot nicer then it is in real life. Maybe im picky. But after a couple days I think its growing on me.It does not create too much bulk, phone stays fairly slim. The protection is likely just above minimal but good enough for my needs. The back feels very nice and the buttons line up and work perfectly.I have seen many people complain about the USB and headphone jacks. I can’t speak for the headphone jacks because I haven’t tried it yet but I can for the USB.If you have old school USB cables, like with the super thick tips, this will likely not work. (These are also considered the cheaper cables).I personally only use decent to good quality cables, mostly from monoprice ($2.99 vs $0.39 for “cheap cables”) and it works just fine. I also have a couple rocketfish cables and they also work fine. But if I had old school or cheap cables, they most likelywould not fit through the micro usb opening left in the case.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: its good & protectivealso you can get the i-phone feeljust the 2 sides button more sensitiveits still a good case ^_^
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: He loves it.  He likes plain, simple, and stylish.  This fits him perfect.  The only complaint is that the charging hole can only fit its original charger from sprint...other than that, its an awesome case.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: well built case. doesn't feel cheap or make the phone look cheap. not bulky at all. seems to give the phone good protection as well
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case was perfect for my Galaxy S4 until it broke.  The plastic trim that holds the case on is thin as long as you don't remove it often you will be fine.  The S4 is a great slim phone and this case helps keep it slim.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: After I researching many other cases I decided to get this one. I am not very fond of bulky cases despite the fact that they offer better protection. For me the looks and feels matter more. In terms of appearance, Spigen Neo Hybrid ranks in the upper echelon of smart phone cases. The back is made from a high-quality plastic that almost feels like rubber. It feels great holding it in the hand. The volume rockers and the lock button work perfect; no problem whatsoever with it. Spigen has thrown in three colorful stickers for the home screen that add a phenomenal touch to the feel of the home button and the over all look.Before buying this case, there is one thing people should be aware of. The cutout for the charger/data cable and the headphone is best designed for the stock Samsung cable and headphones. Some third party cables and headphones might fit, but many will not. My Bose headphone works perfectly with this case, however.There are also some complaints regarding the bulkiness of this case. In my humble opinion, this case is not bulky at all. It offer some levels of protection without sacrificing its sexy and appealing design. If you think this case is bulky, then go check out Otterbox cases, or something similar to them. They are HUGE, BULKY, and unattractive. Some people prefer protection over aesthetics. I do not.I highly recommend this case. It is absolutely beautiful.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: What more can I say about this case that hasn't been said!REMEMBER IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR TOUGH BUILT STRONG PROTECTION THIS CASE IS NOT FOR YOU.This case is protective yes but not for people who are really clumsy or do outdoor work where you're phone would fall. Its sleek sexy and just gives your phone an awesome look! I love it so much I wanna buy another one lol. They need to lower the price of the bumpers tho. Maybe get 2 for $10 that's  reasonable id definitely get it. But overall great case!!!!
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: UPDATE! - After a few months of normal wear the case cracked near the charging port. I carry extra batteries instead of a charger and will go through 2 batteries a day. If they made an option for a strengthened case with no charging port I would opt for that one. Instead I will just buy a couple more rings since I know they have a 3 month shelf life. I still love the slim look and feel and the non grip rubber material.I tried to save money and buy other cases. They were all incredibly bulky. The rubber material with this case was a worry at first. Most will flip your pockets inside-out. Not this one. Pocket friendly.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I bought this and had to ship back right away. The rubber fit fine but the silver ring that fits over to give that good look, broke when trying to put it on. Could have been me but i need something i can remove daily. I help people fix cell phones and often take mine apart to help walk customers through trouble shooting. Was just not for me at this time.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case fits the phone very well.  Adds very minimal bulk and also manages to protect the camera on the back.  The only thing I don't like is that it is pretty slippery.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I love this case.  Feels great in my hands.  The only problem that I've come across is that the cutouts for charging and headphones are too small or too deep.  Aftermarket products will not fit.  I've since switched to a poetic case, which doesn't feel or look as nice, but most of my chargers work and my earbuds fit perfectly.

reviewText: I don't carry this case often, as i have another beater case for everyday. But when i'm going out, i slip this one on, and my phone looks awesome. But if you want your phone to look hot...this is the one.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: i love the aesthetics of the case, and the material on the back of the case feels very nice and smooth, but the side buttons become so sensitive that i find myself constantly turning my phone off accidentally just by holding it with a finger on the button, not even pressing.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Pros:  1. Seems to really protect the device in case of accidental drops.2. Very sleek and nice looking3. LightweightCons: 1. Hard to take on and off (i know why would you want to take it on and off...read below)2. Charging cable other than stock mostly don't fit, Headphone plugs mostly don't fit3. Taking the case on and off to charge on the go or listen to a few mins of music can become frustrated "VERY" easilyOverall:  I like the case and it will do the job, but if I had to buy it again at a premium price like I paid, I would skip it and get a  different case.  If you hardly ever charge yours on the go, or don't use the headphone jack ever than this case is for you.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Ahh!! I love this case! I like how it's lightweight YET really sturdy! The case gives the slightest weight to the phone to enhance the ease of using my S4. I really like the minimalistic look it gives also without screaming PHONE CASE like some other bulkier cases. I also got the new nano screen protector and aluminium buttons from Spigen which are AMAZING! I love Spigen's brand because they are more about emphasizing your phone instead of competing with it.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: no problems and not worried about dropping my very thin Iphone.  Simple to put on and easy to take off if you need too.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I got it for half retail, It arrived in official packaging, unopened. I was able to verify original, the case fits like a glove and removes easily, just keep it in one piece as you do so!It will fit the OEM samsung chargers, and all of the cables i have picked up at the dollar store. but it will not fit anything bigger in any dimension. most otg and mhl cables will not fit either. but it is a great looking, extremely light case with a super smooth finish and feel in the hand. the buttons are extremely tactile with no loss of feel, the case feels smooth and the flat back is much more like an iphone. I truly dislike the rounded edges on the s4 compared to the note 3, and this makes it look and feel much more like a note 3 without the added weight and bulk. when paired with a tempered glass screen protector this is the ultimate combination of protection. It provides all the scratch protection you will ever need with the soft rubber flat backing. It provides amazing corner protection which is the devices biggest flaw. pair it with a good tempered glass screen protector and never worry about those drops again.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Excellent case for my galaxy s4 phone.  All cut outs are there and fits my phone nicely. Case feels solid and looks great.  In fact, I even bought another one for my galaxy note 3 because it looked so cooool.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I've owned both the galaxy s2 and s3 and now I own the s4. and again every time I have to choose between a protective case I choose spigen spg neo hybrid.when I first saw the s2 neo hybrid case I immediately bought it because it had no back cover, rubber and plastic, which made my phone feel slimmer and feel more protected, it immediately became the best phone case I've had to date.Things started to go downhill when I bought the neo hybrid for my s3. It had this issue that wherever the phone was in the case it wouldn't stop turning the volume up or down and even the slightest touch on the power button key side would immediately unlock the phone. that happened because those things were too tall and made too much pressure. I had to cut down some tpu that was on top of the buttons to make it at least usable, but because of that I had to press really hard to make the buttons responsive, another problem that i had, along with the nexus 4 official case is that the super thin plastic where the USB hole is placed breaks too easily. after it breaks you're still protected but It doesn't feel nice to have the poly carbonate part loose.Today I just received my package including the neo hybrid case and a steinheil screen protector for my galaxy s4. the first thing I noticed is that the blue poly carbonate part of the case is not as shiny as the picture above shows it (apparently that's a 3D render), it is opaque and the neo hybrid logo at the side of the poly carbonate isn't as sharp and good looking as the s3's was, almost feels like the s4's poly carbonate part is a cheaply made imitation. It also has the super thin air plastic where the usb hole is, which I think will break after a month or two from grabbing my phone from my jeans pocket with two fingers. As soon as I put  the phone inside the case... did you guess?... HAPPENS THE SAME DAMN THING that happened with the s3 neo hybrid case, but in this case the thing that is over the power button is the only problem, HOWEVER it's another plastic button and not part of the tpu and therefore I can't cut it down. One workaround that I found was putting some paper in between the tpu and the poly carbonate parts just a little below where the power button is in order to hold my phone without it being unlocked by itselfI won't lie, the phone feels really protected against drops and stuff. I just hope it doesnt wear my s4's back cover as the s3's did because of dust filtering after some months (I used to clean it like once a week or so). It doesn't add much bulk and looks really classy despite the blue polycarbonate part is opaque.Jeez Spigen please design your cases better. I'll give you one more chance with the neo hybrid case when the s5 comes out. if I have the same problem AGAIN, I won't buy your cases even if yours are the prettiest out there...
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Sure it's really slim and sure the colors are appealing, but once you make the mistake of buying one, you'll see that the headphone hole is at least 3mm from the jack itself. This means if you have the right-angle type headphone cables, this case will not be your friend. The whole is only friendly to headphone cables that raise straight up like the Samsung original earbuds. THIS WILL NOT BE COMPATIBLE WITH BEATS CABLES!!! Also when you shake the phone or have it set down on a table, you'll hear the clicking of the power and volume buttons as they vibrate. It sounds chicklety. The navy color is so dark it will only appear navy in bright light. The photos taken to show you are probably taken under flash. This will be the most honest review you'll find
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: So once I broke my Galaxy S4 screen. Cost me$200 to fix it... I finally decided to consider getting a case after 5 years of smart phones I've owned withoutcases. My $630 phone became $830 with a $200 screen front half replacement I had to buy off Amazon (which was a great deal). Let me tell you. I hate cases... But I need to protect my gadgets from my rare case of phone drops. Never have I broke a phone before so it took a break to wise up on this matter and get one. This was my first case ever on any phone and it was a good one. I even review it on my YouTube channel here at [...] It has a rubber inside and a plastic outer frame that detaches. I dropped my phone from nipple high and nothing broke. Saved me once already. Even though it's not the thinnest case it's a good looker though. And lastly, only straight head 3.5mm head phones plug in to the cut outs. Also some of the  USB charger cables don't fit right...stock one that comes with your device fit perfectly though
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I thought I loved this case, After having it for a while I changed my mind.  It's beautiful and sleek, but the headphone jack will only fit small plugs for aux and headphone cables.  Luckily I had tiny plugs for both but the real reason I don't like it?  I ordered one and my friend ordered one for himself, his two brothers, and his dad.  all 5 of our cases broke in the same exact spot.  Mine lasted the longest at about 6 months, but the first two broke within a month.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: A smart looking case for your smart phone. it's easy to put on your phone so long as you pay attention and read the instructions. mine has already taken a tumble or two and no scratches on the case even. the nice part about the case is the phone now sits flush on the table and doesn't sit on the camera lens and it has a lip so when you place the phone up side down the screen has some distance away from the surface still.This is a great case and it's thin too so doesn't add bulk. I recommend it.**UPDATE**After having this case for a few months the area near the camera has started to bow out and sag a little. Not a HUGE deal, but enough for it to disappoint me a bit. No stars off, but not really worth more than $15 imo.**Update 2**After about 6 months the frame around the case broke, but the company will not honor their warranty unless you purchased it from their website. Really?!?! down to 1 star just on the stupid warranty bull alone.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Being that I came from an iphone to the galaxy, i was slightly disappointed with its form factor...this case makes it all better.  My phone looks so sleek now, I love it.  Only downfall as others have said is the area around the charging port is weak, mine has already cracked but still holding on.  Just make sure you are only using cables that are meant for the phone...In a pinch i use my kindle paperwhite charger and i have a feeling that is why my case cracked, its a snug fit.  But other than that its wonderful, i actually bought a replacement frame since i love it so much.  SGP never disappoints.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: If you want to keep your s4 nice and slim and yet still protected this is the way to go! It feels so nice and due to it's flat sides you can grip it nicely and it doesn't slide off fingers like rounded cases (otterbox, etc)It fit most of my chargers but the one sit didn't I just got exacto and trimmed the plug and they all fit now. I really like the option to change colors of the bumpers and I got the Yellow Reventon color which is so sporty and eye catching.Seriously this is a great case and it will give you decent protection and if it breaks just replace the bumper. But at least I feel it would protect my phone from a corner drop.It does give you some lay on the table protection with a bit of a lip on front of case. The buttons are very clickable yet sturdy.It fits nicely in back jeans pocket as well as inside sports coat pocket or outside chest pocket.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This is completely a five star product. I have tried a lot of cases and they were all hot and cold compared to this bowl of porridge. This case inspired me to look into other spigen products that's how much I like it. It's nice and thin but not so thin that it doesn't feel sturdy. It will handle most average drops easily I'm sure. Adds a little grip as well. I love it for when I'm out. I love the s4 out of a case tho when just relaxing at home and this case is pretty easily removable and in a way the phone is not going to just pop out. Good stuff Spigen.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: There were higher expectations at my end of this product. Was really hoping for a better tight fit and with the ring around I was expecting a more stable grip.

reviewText: Great is a super saver clashes, anti slips, and so much original, with no pity for the Galaxy S3, I would buy one for my son
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Fits perfect on phone, it makes phone feel better and secure. The quality is great. I Love it. Worth every penny...
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I absolutely love this case cover it is luxurious and tough I could not be more happier with the way it looks on my phone. It is the envy of many!!! Thank u so very much for the wonderful service and quality of the product!
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Don't know how anyone can give this anything but 5 stars. Excellent fitment, awesome aesthetics, top notch protection and at this price point nothing else better on the market. I have been through soo many cases from over the years including Otterbox and other high price options, this Spigen is absolutely in the same quality and build as any one of them. love my case and my S4 loves it too...
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case fits the Galaxy 4 perfectly, it has a slim look not bulky like other cases. The access openings for the charger and headphones are accessible and the on-off and volume buttons work well without any problems.  The camera, flash and speaker openings align perfectly with the plone.  The only concern is that if I were ever to drop the phone this case would not protect it very well....sacraficed the looks and slim fit for protection.  I ordered the slate blue case and it matches my blue Galaxy 4 quite well. The case feels secure while holding it, not like the Otter Commuter that I had on my Galaxy 3 that felt quite slippery because of the smooth plastic back and sides and the on-off and volume buttons were difficult to use, you needed to press them hard enough to make them work properly. Overall I'm very satisfied with this case.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: This case looks great on the phone but unfortunately it has two major design flaws.1. the bottom port for the micro usb cord is very small and not all chargers are going to work (the official Samsung Galaxy S4 one does)2. The headphone port at the top is way too small and none of my earbuds nor headsets fit - this was my biggest issue since I use my phone all the time with headphones that cost almost as much as my phone. For this reason I have moved on to Spigen's slimarmor case in red with is a little more friendly to use wit both ports.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I bought this to protect my tablet without adding bulk. It does the job well, fits perfectly and looks good.  The price is very attractive as well.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Like many, I didn't bother to read the directions, just installed.  Came real close to breaking it.  Then one day I came across the instructions and since have removed and reinstalled without an issue.  The biggest deal... I just ordered the inductive charging back, which works just fine with the Nokia charging stand, and found this back works without issue!  The Otterbox version I have does not.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Overall I like this case.  It offers decent coverage and protection for such a slim profile.  On the same note, I don't think it would hold up well to drops from waist height or higher.  But for everyday bumps and scratches, it suffices.  I did notice it is a bit slippery.  The buttons are nice and tactile, albeit the power button is a touch sensitive, especially when removing from the pocket (I always seem to hit it when taking the phone out.  I use this case when I'm not using my primary UAG case.  I have several different USB charging/data cables and haven't run into any fitment problems.  Every set of corded earbuds I have fit the port for the headphone jack.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Really protective and will keep your Galaxy from smashing to bits. I like the way this case hugs my phone and has a lip in the front for when placing the phone face down. Doesn't add bulk to the phone either. Feels just right in your hand.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: Really nice case! Besides Neo Hybrid color being darker than I expected everything else is as described. The phone looks really good, but not stunning. I mean, even though I like it, nobody noticed it or complimented me on it. I gave it 4 stars because after using it for about month, I still find using the phone a little awkward. It's almost like the back edges are too sharp for the comfort fit. It's a little hard using this phone with one hand. Let's put it this way, since the price of the case is not too high, I am considering trying another case. Spigen has another one with rounded edges. I may try that one.As far as durability, I don't drop my phone too often. I did a couple of times, and the case was excellently durable.I had not problem with chargers/earphones and buttons on the case are fantastic.
title: Galaxy S4 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Galaxy S4 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10215)

reviewText: I bought this case based on the great online reviews. I was dissapointed to see that the lip goes barely above the screen, so it would not protect it in case of a fall face down. I have dropped my phone many times, and was looking for something that looks good but will give me good protection when it falls. This case may not be it. I have no problem with the rest of the case. Looks great, It's very slim, good feel, good response with all the buttons. Just wish the rubber lip above the screen was higher.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: I have owned a lot of cell phone cases for the iPhone in the past, but I wanted one for my iPhone 5 that did not make it too think and still protected it.  This is the perfect case for just that.  I would recommend this case to anyone and I already have.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: After being indecisive for a period of time trying to pick a case that might suit me in terms of value and function on top of appearance, I decided on this Spigen case. I absolutely love it!Pros:Double layered! Although I've never really dropped it so I can't attest to how protective the case is, it's withstood the minor bumps and whatnot with no issues whatsoever.Works great with the iPhone 5S camera and flash (doesn't block it)Clean and simple appearanceGood grip: bumper part is a tad slippery, but the matte back provides an excellent grip.Power buttons and sound buttons work great! It makes pressing them very easy despite having a case.Small lip over screen - I can put my iPhone face down with no concerns!Cons:Attracts dust at the openings (power, earphone, silence switch, speakers at bottom, etc)Matte back coating seems to get scratched a little easily
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: HTE HYBRID CASE IS THE ONE THAT REALLY MADE ME LOVE IT. THE FINISH IS SIMPLY SUPERB. THE ADDITIONAL THIN FRAME AROUND THE PHONE MAKES IT PRETTY SAFE. I REALLY REALLY LIKED IT. THE BUTTONS GIVEN TO CONTROL THE UPHONE BUTTONS WROK PERFECTLY. WILL LIKE TO BUY MORE FROM THIS IN THE FUTURE.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: It's the PERFECT case for iPhone 5s:10/10 .. Style, Quality, Finishing10/10 .. Feel & Touch10/10 .. Access: Buttons, Camera, Flash, Speakers, Mic, Charging8/10 .. Protection
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: Now I see a lot of people are complaining about shipping but you have to understand with the champagne gold being a new colorway of the iPhone it would take a while for third parties to replicate the color so production takes time. Hence why everyone got a shipping number so early and it didn't ship till the 16th. I understand why give customers a shipping number before actually shipping? It's for them to organize who's order came in first and such.But I received my case today, and the packaging was good. The case looks amazing! This case gives me my gold fix for my space grey 5s. It is a 2 piece case, a rubber or tpu casing with a gold bumper. The case fits well and slim. Doesn't add much bulk. The buttons are working and tactile. You can hear the buttons shake a bit but if that seriously bothers you, you're being way too picky. The lightning port works with the apple lightning port, and it has room for third party lightning cables. As for the headphone jack my beats pro jack fits it perfect. Large headphone jacks might have a problem.If you don't have a screen shield you will have a small lay on the table feature. If you have a regular screen shield you'll still have a BIT of a lay of the table design. I am using Spigen's Glass.tR and its flush with the case, so NO lay on the table design. Most tempered glass shields will be flush. But that doesn't bother me. For drop protection it seems like it can handle typical drops. But if you're the type of person to constantly drop your phone especially outside this might not be the case for you.Overall if you're looking for a slim yet protective case that looks amazing in Champagne Gold this is the case for you!
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: This case is awesome, I love the way it hugs the iPhone, I bought one for my wife and it was soooo nice, that I ended up buying one for myself. It protects the iPhone very nicely, and will not make your iPhone look bulky and huge. Very dynamic and smooth. Highly recommend this case.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: Sharp case, lots of compliments.  Installs easy and works great with glass screen protector.  Well done
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: Bought for my girlfriend after getting the same style for my s4. She loves it and actually keeps talking about how much nicer it is to hold her iphone with this case. Also they offer a great protection for how slim the fit is.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: This is by far the best case I have yet to find for my 5c. I tried the "flap" style but that was a pain so I switched to this plus the tech armor glass. Time will tell if it holds up. The buttons are quite responsive.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: the case seems verey flimsy at first when taken out of the package but it fits great on the phone and it looks really nice and i have no issues with it at all.  I have no dropped my phone so I can't say whether it offers good protection or not, but it has a nice feel to it and easy to grip so it hasn't slipped.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: It is a really good case. Fits perfect and feels perfect in the hand. However, be CAREFUL with the buttons in the bumper, especially the power/sleep button. Mine fell off the first day I got it and I spent 2 hours finding it coz it's tiny. Also, you will have to keep in mind that the button may fall off everytime you open the case. Other than that it is really a good case and a good value for my money. Red and Silver variants look good on a black iPhone. I also installed a Spigen Clear Steinheil Ultra Crystal screen protector on the phone and it works really well with the case.****UPDATE (11/4)****The microphone sound jack opening is too small to fit through a jack with slightly larger base. The sound jack of my Bose Companion speakers won't fit through the case. With bluetooth speakers available now a days this shouldn't be a problem but I wouldn't buy a bluetooth speaker just due to this issue. Some over the ear or on-ear headphone jacks will also have trouble fitting through this for example I tested Marshall's Monitor on ear headphones and the jack won't fit through the case.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: Wonderful case. Light, well built and perfect fit. I looked around a lot of cases for my 5S. I would have loved to buy the Spigen Neo Hybrid Ex Slim bumpers which are essentially the same case as this one except the back portion. One issue with that case was that it the third party cables didn't fit in thru the opening for cable in the bottom. Finally decided to go with this one and its awesome. Good protection all around. Looks sleek and Red adds a little colorUpdate : Two things happened. I dropped my phone, though not on concrete, but the phone was all fine. Other thing I was trying to show the case to a friend, so I took it off the phone and the put it back after some time. But after some time I realized that the sleep awake metal button is missing. It looked around an found it on the floor. I tried to put it back and it went back, but now I am sure that next time I take the case off the button is loose and will fall. Its a good case but the buttons are loosely glued or something.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: When it comes to cases, I am very picky. When I came across this beauty, it was love at first sight. Decided to order quickly as it seemed like a popular item and inventory was running low. I'm glad I made the impromptu decision; the case is perfect, IMO. It fits snugly, very like weight but protects the phone nicely. The camera cutout is perfect and the aluminum accents are a nice touch. The one band of color is nice, especially for those who don't want to be too flashy but at the same time want a little differentiation. Overall, great case and I think it's the best iPhone 5 case out there right now.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: I just love this case. It has a nice snug tight fit. It adds very very little bulk. I can also use my glass screen shield with this case.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: This is my third Spigen case. I also have the Tough Armor and Slim Armor S. This is my favorite. It's the thinnest and slides easily in and out of pocket. I use the Tough armor for work and keep it in a holster, but this is my weekend case, slimmer and fits better in my pocket. I still have one of these on my ip4 I bought back in 2010 and it still looks pretty good. Hope this one is as durable. Highly recommend Spigen Cases.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: I own a total of 6 iPhone cases including the Spigen Neo Hybrid and its by far the best one i've used yet. Only one that comes anywhere close to it is my Spigen Slim Armor case as far as durability, quality and overall design.Pro'sIts literally so slim you wont notice its on your phone.It looks classy. I've had mine for a few days and ive gotten compliments.Works with glass screen protectors. I am currently using a Tech Armor Ballistic Glass screen protector and it works just fine.The outer bumper can be swapped out with different colors. The red is pretty sweet though. Maybe ill get a white one at some point to try it out.Another huge PRO is the fact that it has built in buttons instead of just raised rubber buttons. They feel solid, not hard to press and click when you press them.Con'sThe price in my opinion is a bit steep for what it is. I have no doubt in my mind that Spigen makes these for just a few bucks. Still a darn nice case though.I bought this on amazon and was shipped directly from Spigen. Took almost 3 weeks to arrive. Yes I said 3 weeks. What the heck is that about? I kept emailing Spigen customer care and a gentleman named Avery kept assuring me that the case was going to ship soon or had shipped every few days until one day it actually did ship. <---- This means its a good product but the customer service is pretty lousy in my opinion. No effort was made to compensate me for the extremely long wait other than Avery offering me a refund which I denied because I wanted the darn case. I figured atleast a coupon or something to knock off money on my next purchase or overnight shipping on the case. Nope, Nothing. Took 1 star off of my rating because of their poor or lack of service.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: Same perfect Neo Hybrid case, with new (Champagne Gold) color.Very sweet looking case, which I have the iPhone 5s white/silver its covering.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: I don't expect much from most phone cases, and I usually just go to Five Below or other cheap retail store to get a case, because other than those $60 or up cases, they're all subject to the same issues...and with stores like Five below, I can get to check out a bunch of different options and even buy a few to see what works with me and what doesn't at a low financial risk. However, I recently just ordered the i-Phone 5s and want to make sure it's well taken care of and still looks and feels great.  I searched around for something decent, and I even considered going after a case that would save my 5s from any harm that could befall it...BUT I'm not chasing tornadoes or planning on taking wild trips through the wilderness, so I decided not to waste my money on anything like that.  Then I came across the SPIGEN SGP Neo Hybrid Case, watched the video review, and was intrigued.  Seemed to be just what I was looking for, and at the approx. $20 price, I figured why not? Fortunately, my phone and case arrived on the same day (as amazing as that could be!), and I was ready to go. According to the video review, I assumed it would be a little more fragile than it actually is. If the outer band is removed and replaced with care and patience, then it should last for quite awhile. Now, if you're heavy handed, then that's on you.  I also believe the grooved design on the inside will help out with any moderate impact issues the phone may experience. Nice, sleek, smooth design with an edge that I can appreciate. The headphone opening does present a bit of an issue, but it fits the Apple Earpods perfectly, and my other headphones with a larger jack size fit in nicely after a trip to see the exacto knife! I figured that the extra rubber/plastic around the jack that was preventing the jack from great access wouldn't be missed, and I was right. Of course, if it's all metal there, you won't be able to do that, but just a thought. This case is definitely not accident proof, but it offers decent protection if you take care of your phone.  And I still bought a more heavy-duty case for when I decide to play in traffic at Five Below! :) Enjoy it as I am!
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)

reviewText: This is a nice case that is attractive.  I did have some issues getting it onto my 5s.  It felt like I was going to snap the bezel when putting it onto the phone.  Speaking of the bezel, I wish it had a more tacky feel instead of slick plastic.

reviewText: Complete deal breaker as far as I'm concerned. The volume buttons don't fit flush with the device on the iPhone 5S. When you look at the front of the phone, there's a bulge on the side of the Spigen case where the volume buttons don't fit inside the case. You can press down on the side of the case anywhere on the left side, and it causes you to depress one or both volume buttons.Besides that deal breaker it's a great case. Good quality and no sticky rubber to get caught up in my pants pocket.And the best part....No stupid cut out for the tacky Apple logo!
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10360)
