Each time I had to take of the case (no easy task) and wait on it to dry. Anyway, this case is not as protective, but it's good enough. I like the look of the silver/gray. The only drawback, and reason for losing a star, is that the back scratches easily. The first day it was on my phone, scratches appeared all over the back. They are not noticeable from a distance, but it was still annoying that it didn't look new after one day.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: I am a business man, and am fairly gentle on my electronics.  I travel a lot for business, and am using my phone all day.  This provides the perfect amount of protection for my phone.Pros:*small lip on top of phone to protect screen*rubber buttons for volume and power*they actually make it easier to use than the original*very small footprint*great protection*all accessories work well*does not interfere with reception*does not interfere with cameraAll-in-all, this is the perfect case for moderate protection.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: First of all I will start with the most agitating feature of the case. If you have short nails, it is just about impossible to get the phone from loud to silent. I have to use something really thin to put in there and put the switch back down. Silent to loud is slightly easier but it still requires so effort and concentration. This is a very frustrating part of the case to the point that I'm torn between returning it and keeping it. The other buttons are all easy to push. I have yet to test out the headphone jack out on larger cords but if it fits my aux cord in my car I may consider raising the rating to four stars. The lightening connector space is quite large and will probably fit most larger third party chargers. Oh and for those of you like me who didn't know what TPU was before you ordered this case, the best wayI can describe it is half runner half plastic. It won't snag or grip to things like a rubber band but it also will not break of you bend it. I'm a little scared for my phone in this case. I feel the material isn't shock absorbent enough to resist cracks after a fall but time will tell.Ryan
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: Yes, it's a case and if you are like me you really get into a "great case" and when you find one that you like, you tend to rant about it. I was hesitant and first, and scoured all the reviews for why this Spigen SGP10365 Slim (SLIM) Armor case would suck, but it really didn't get that many bad reviews. This will be over a month now since I slipped my new iPhone 5s into it's Spigen case and here's what I like about it:- slim- protective lip for face down on flat surfaces protecting the screen- looks great- ports are accessible, buttons are as well- camera works great, no flash blockage, glare, etc.- it protected my phone from at least three pocket level drops so far (knock on wood). Dropped onto office floor, parking lot and drive way...the rubberized slim bumpers on each corner did their job- Thank you Spigen!What I didn't like:- nothing yet...
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: It's only been on a couple days, but I love the feel of it. Arrived undamaged, applied easily. We'll see how it holds up.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: This is probably the best case I've gotten for my phone so far. First of all, it looks really nice on my phone. It fits perfect and still leaves the phone incredibly slim, while the rubber piece is thick enough that I know it will protect my phone if I drop it. I always have issues with buttons on cases like this, but the buttons are perfect. They are easy to press and have a very satisfying clicking sound when you press them. The only bad thing about it is I wish there was more room for the headphone jack. But it's not that big of a deal if your cable isn't too thick.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: I have tried Otterbox Defenders, Lifeproof, Speck, you name it...  but was never satisfied with any of those cases, especially for the money.  I wanted a solid case that didn't look or feel cheap, but was slim enough not to make my iPhone feel huge.  This cue fit the bill nicely.  Materials are first-rate, and feel very solid and durable.  Silicone is not soft and rubbery, and holds it's shape well.  Hard backing goes on, and all feels very solid.  Grey and silver looks great on my white phone.  Very good case!
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: I took a chance on this case based on reviews and I'm glad I did. I love the two-tone look and have gotten several envious looks and even a couple family members have ordered their own.It's a great fitting case and truly is the slimmer version as advertised. The protection is solid and feels great in your hand. The top and bottom of the phone have a more rubbery coating which provides just the right amount of grip. It does have the "lip" that comes up on TOP of the glass just ever so slightly (it almost sits back at the metal frame but not quite). As a result, if you get something like a Zagg screen cover, ask for the case friendly design that backs off the edges by a mm or so. I didn't and it still has been ok and not bunched or pushed the screen cover. But it's close enough I would have like the extra room.Most importantly to me, you can tell this case was designed with the phone in hand and not just slapped together from leaked specs. The buttons work perfectly, the cutouts are just right and there is no slack or slop in the fit of the frame around the edges. Even the bottom lip under the home button is still sturdy and straight after a couple months.This case loses a star for me with the wear on the backplate. As others have commented, it wears ridiculously quick. I have two roundish spots on the top and bottom of the backplate where the material has worn enough that it's no longer the same shine as the rest of the backplate. Plus there are a bunch of scratches all over the back, but they aren't very noticeable and ONLY on the backplate.But overall, that isn't noticeable enough or significant enough to detract from the case overall. If they could just fix that one issue, the case would be perfect in my eyes.
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: This is my current favorite case. It does provide protection if you lay it down on the table. The build quality feels very nice. It is two pieces and they sell different colored back plates. The bottom ports can fit just about any headphone I've tried. I only have the standard apple lightning charger, but it looks like it could fit any brands lightning plug. The only complaint about this case is it does show scratches on the case(not the phone).
title: iPhone 5S Case, Spigen Slim Armor S Case for iPhone 5/5S - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10365)

reviewText: I will give it the rating it deserves although it is not the case for me, main complain for me is that it slipped from my hand many times, but as far as protecting the phone it is one of the best cases.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Very sleek and protectiveThe itemIs stylish and I higy recommend it in metal blue slate color.Some people mentioned that it is slippery. Nog that bad and certainly not worth a bad review. Unless you are clumsy and drop it the first day ....
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Fits like a glove on the iPhone 5c.  Luckily I haven't had to test it at all.  But I like it alot.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: I love the bright red color which makes it easy to spot in my purse. The case is sleek and does not add as much bulk as an Otterbox case. Too bad it doesn't have a cutout for the apple symbol.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Better than my Otter. Great price. Fits the 5s wonderful.  Well built. I would buy it again, and recommend it to my friends.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: These are great looking cases that are straight forward to put on and remove, but wont come apart. Offers protection comparable to the otter box commuter case
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: This is the ONLY case my son has kept on his phone.  WHY?  Slim design. Unlike other brands who believe to protect your phone you must bulk up.  NO just make the case shock absorbent and it can be done.  Spigen is my go to iPhone case for that reason.  I have the iPhone 5S case and like this one for the iPhone 5C it's slim, neat, stylist and elegant design.  Doesn't detract from what Steve Jobs wanted from his products, clean lines and fluid design.As a women I prefer a case that isn't bulky or add weight to my pocketbook and fits nicely into the slot the pocketbooks have for your cell now.  My son, he can fit it into his back pocket (now to worry he'll sit on it) and front pocket.I don't think, man or women, you will be unhappy with this case.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: My son picked this out for his 5C and it fits very well and has provided excellent protection so far.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: It looks nice and it fits well in my hand. It protected the phone very well. I have dropped it a couple of times and it still looks like new.very durable
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Very durable case perfect fit love this case I recommend it very much just sucks it didn't come with jelly buttons
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: This case looked okay but I returned it.  The comments said it would work with Iphone 5, 5c and 5s, but I learned later it wouldn't.  It is also not metal, but plastic.  I returned it without opening the package for these reasons, so I can' really rate the product fairly
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Nothing to say, just say the brand and ypu ara guaranteed of a very functional and nice case. Well donde Spigen
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Arrived in 3 days not 2 as i paid forBought this for my wife and she likes itthese covers look and feel nice. very colorful and are much better than holding i phone without a cover.they are very good against minor bumps and brushes and drops on the carpet.Although I wouldnt want to drop it on concrete. Doesnt seem to be that tough.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: If you are looking for a medium protection case for your 5C this is nice. It will completely cover your phone, so if you bought your phone to showcase the cool color, this case is not for you. However, the quality is good and the price is fair.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: Liked this case so much that I bought one for my brother. Only complaint is the back scratches a little easy but it's not a big deal. I like that it slips in and out of my pocket easily without sticking to my clothes like my previous rubber case did. My brother was super impressed with the case once he realized what he had. He said, "Love my case!!!! Totally growing on me. I want all the colors now. I didn't realize what you got me till now. It's the S---. Ty. " he has the iPhone 5 version.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: I had an Otterbox Commuter for my iPhone 4s. Loved it. When I upgraded to the iPhone 5c I looked at the commuter again. Not impressed. I wanted 4-sided protection but the 5c version of the commuter leaves the bottom of the phone under protected (IMHO). I looked pretty obsessively at many cases offered on Amazon until I found this one. Search over. This is a two piece case like the commuter but unlike the soft silicone inner layer of the commuter, this case has a rigid rubber inner layer. It does not lose its shape or integrity even though it is not wrapped on all sides by the plastic shell. The two pieces fit over the phone very snugly but is still fairly easy to get off and on. I have had to adjust to how slippery it is. I love that it does not cling to the inside of my pocket (where it spends most of its time) but it is a little slippery in my hands, on on the car seat or couch. A minor irritant far outweighed by the benefits of the case. Next time I upgrade, this will be the first case I look at. I'm a fan!
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: I am really impressed with Spigen cases. I purchased a similar case for my Galaxy S4 and loved it. It was very sleek and did not add bulk to an already large phone. When the family purchased iPhones, I immediately searched for Spigen cases for the 5C. My son loves it and it provides adequate protection and it looks great.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: The cliche "you get what you pay for" isn't a cliche when referring to this case.  It is well made, fits the 5c perfectly and looks very sleek in the process.  I tend to be the one who tries to find that perfect $10 case.  No more
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: I had to get a durable case for the wife, because you know how girls treat gadgets :(This case is great, she dropped the phone plenty of times and nothing happened, the case shows no wear.She also got compliments at work for it. So she's happy with it.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: I haven't dropped this one yet, so I can't say how it will do under that type of situation.  I'm accustomed to Otterbox but didn't want to spend that much on a company cell phone.  But, I didn't want to be responsible for damage to my company cell phone either.  So, I compromised on price and bought the Spigan SGP10543. The Otterbox on my Samsung S4 is much more substantial and looks like it would offer more protection.  I HAVE dropped the Samsung from some pretty dramatic heights onto hard tile with no damage in the Otterbox.  I am a little concerned that the Spigen will not protect as well, but I don't carry my company cell except in business situations anyway.  The Spigen does offer some protection without the bulk, and the price was much less. I'm satisfied with the Spigen.
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: I went through a couple cases before I found this one.  It looks like a well-made piece that should protect my phone well for my needs.  It also has a great "feel" to it in my hand.  It fits perfectly and cleans easily.  (I love the color too.)  I bought a second one for my husband and he loves his as well.  We have had them for a little while with no issues.  It's difficult to find something so well constructed nowadays, so unless you need more screen protection you can stop spending time searching through reviews and buy.  The glowing reviews I read on this one were correct!
title: iPhone 5C Case, Spigen Tough Armor Case Series for iPhone 5C -  Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10543)

reviewText: This case is amazing, I've had it on my phone since it came out. The back can attract oil a bit, but it's not much of an issue. It will keep your device protected, and will look good doing it
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought this cover and first of all I had the power button problem, who I manually fixed it, but the worst part is just in a 2 months the whiter hard plastic start to get gray. Looks horrible !!  I would like to but a red or black one to avoid that but I have to buy the whole case. If you want to buy one, buy the red or the black.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The main reason to buy a light case like this is looks. It will offer protection, but not by much.Overall I was pleased with it. Bought it for a friend of mine. It does not have the soft-touch plastic the black case has, and I don't like it as much as the black one. But it does look good and hides fingerprints well. It will also recess your camera lens to avoid scratches. The buttons are covered and feel a bit stiffer than normal but I did not have any problems using them.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I did a ton of research, looking into every case possible and reviews of them all. I wanted something thin, light weight, grippy and something that can protect the phone. This did them all perfectly and for a great price.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Received the good case.  No power button issues.  Case is light.  Gold color looks nice too.  But I doubt the rubber casing would provide amble protection if I dropped the phone.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought this case for my Nexus since I had a tough armor case for my iPhone 5 and loved it. Very sturdy tpu and plastic cover but I can't say the same for this.The tpu is the same, very sturdy and tough but a little too tough. It's a little tough pressing the volume and power buttons. Sometimes you get feedback and sometimes you don't. The hard cover seems to be the same. Putting the case on the first time was a little difficult since I thought I was going to break it getting the buttons in but I found a trick by aligning the buttons first and then pushing in the bottom sides.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Portly.  Husky.  Substantial.  All better adjectives to describe this armor.  Because slim it isn't.Nice case.  Good protection.  Color is nice.  Very matte.  Adds quite a bit of thickness and weight.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I was worried with the initial reviews of having problems with the buttons sticking but i had no such problems. Case fits just fine and looks sharp
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: First I wear carpenter style jeans/pants often and I usually carry my phone in the leg pocket. With that said I was looking for a case that could withstand a drop and not shatter but also wasn't soft spongy rubber that would get stuck in my pocket. The makings of this case was just what I wanted in that aspect, hard white outer shell with a firm rubber/plastic black inner shell. What I absolutely couldn't stand with this case is that power and volume button guards stood out past the edge of the case, so far that If I squatted down for any length of time, the tension of my jeans pressing on the phone in my pocket would either turn off my phone or restart it because the power button was being held down. I bought another Spigen case and am happy with it over this one.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This is a nice looking case that fits on the Nexus 5 perfectly. The plastic is high quality. I think it should protect it from at least minor spills. It has held up well over the first month of use and still looks a nice white. It isn't too bulky, either.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The case is high quality, very protective, but there was a defect above the volume button where the plastic was misshapen, and then it came in some packaging that was very crumpled.Those things aside, it is a very protective and quality case.  My only other complaint is that the buttons are almost too easy to press.  It's nice to not have to push super hard on such a protective case, but at the same time, i don't want to worry about them getting bumped and having the screen on all the time.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I like this case, but there are a few issues I have with it.  The first issue I have is that it doesn't work with my wireless Nexus charger (my Spigen Neo-Hybrid cases do work).  The second issue is that the buttons aren't as easy and responsive as the buttons on the Spigen Neo Hybrid Case (which are excellent).  And lastly, the back is so thick that it's narrowing the beam of the LED (flash) when I use the camera; again, not an issue with the Neo Hybrid.  It is a really well built case, and it fits really good.  The color matches what you see in the picture, and it's pretty easy to take on and off.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought two cases from this company because I wanted to try them both. My intent was to return the one I liked less and unfortunately this is the one that's going back. The reason for the 2 stars is because this case is really nice. It's built well and it really protects the phone due to its tight fit and rugged feel. However, it fits too tight though...it's so bad that the power button is absolutely useless. In fact, it actually just holds the button down the entire time!!I've read the other reviews here and it seems like the manufacturer is working on a fix for this, but I'm no longer interested. I prefer the slimmer case anyway, but I'll just have to make sure the phone doesn't take any real drops. Here's the other one I bought:SPIGEN Google Nexus 5 Case Slim [Ultra Fit] [Smooth White] Premium Matte Hard Case for Nexus 5 - Smooth White (SGP10561)All in all, Spigen seems to make some very nice cases and the prices aren't that bad. If they can fix this one, I'm sure it'll be a top seller, but stay away for now.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Fit is too tight causing the slightest amount of pressure on the buttons to activate the phone. Spigen should have made the white plastic shell have larger button cutouts. They plastic shell interfers with the tpu buttons because the fit is too tight. This purchase was a waste of money. Do yourself a favor and buy another case.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The case is made of very nice material and the gold color is identical to that of the iPhone 5s. The TPU is very strong, and I had no problem with durability. However, the buttons were incredibly mushy and had absolutely no tactile feeling.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I tried with many hard cases, even for this same trade. Finally I prefered this one. It's a very nice design and fits perfectly on the cellphone. Recomeded.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Spigen continues to make quality cases that add little to no bulk to the phone. Highly recommend for Nexus 5 owners.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Everything about this case is close to perfect! Its a 2 piece case, one TPU layer and one hard plastic piece. The plastic is rubberized in the same way the TPU case feels so the while thing is slightly grippy but not annoyingly grippy. The cutouts are perfect and the buttons are all covered. It works with wireless charging as well. The logo is discreet and this has has all of Spigen's latest features (air cushion technology, lay on table design etc) My only complaint, and its a personal one, is that it makes the phone feel a little too chunky but I have confidence in this case that it would be protected if I drop it.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I'm going to give this case 1 star due to a serious flaw that renders it unusable. The button press on the power and volume rockers are unusable, and though the case itself is nice, I'll never use it.  It's basically a waste of 20 bucks.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The look and feel is wonderful. Its easy to grip , protects like crazy, and dosnt slip out of my hand. Construction is great! I would recommend this easily to a Nexus 5 User.UPDATE: 05-06-2014I was running with my phone in my hand and threw my phone (On accident) perhaps 10 yards onto concrete and it bounced on the corner and slid on the face for maybe 5 feet. Phone is fine, took it out of the semi-mangled case and tad-a! Quite possibly the best case I have ever purchased.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Despite the complaints here my case has been great. When I first put it on, like many others here, the phone immediately shut off and I couldn't wiggle the power button into place right. However I quickly realized this was because the harder polycarbonate backing is not flexible enough to allow the TPU inner core to properly fit over the power button. All you have to do is remove the hard back plate and fit the inner cover properly, then put the backplate on. Bam, no problems with the power button.This case is stylish, feels great in hand, and while it adds some bulk it also seems incredibly tough and I feel my phone will be very well protected.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The app you have to use to enable all of the cool functionality is so buggy (at least on my Nexus 5) that it's completely unusable.  Supposedly there's going to be a new app May 1, but Spigen never responded to my public forum post (never released it to be posted, actually) or my e-mail, so I'm not waiting.  Shipping it back today.FYI, the determination that the cover is closed is done with the light sensor at the top-right of the N5, so if you cover that any other way, or even put the phone somewhere really dark, it thinks the cover is closed and tries to launch the app.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I fell in love with this case. It looks amazing in white. There was no issue putting this phone into the case. As cited by other reviewers, the power button was hard to press. Sometimes I would have to press it numerous time to turn on the screen. Was I annoyed? Definitely! However, I could not get over the fact how amazing the case looks. The case was definitely a tank. I normally take very good care of my phone, and I rarely drop the phone. The otterbox may be the tanks of all tanks, but it looks like crap and it is huge. I could never carry a phone with a otterbox case in my pocket. This case slides into my pocket and it does not feel slippery in my hand. Since I have not dropped my phone, I cannot speak to its durability, but it sure feels durable.For those who are concern with the power button issue, my workaround was an app called "Gravity Screen." Basically when I place the phone face down onto a table, it will shut off. When I turn it over facing me, it will turn on. Also, if you place the phone into your pocket, it shuts off. The app is not a battery drainer either. I know that this might be a bit of an issue for most people, but for me I am happy with this case.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Great Fit, Great protection. Very slippery surface which may lead to problems for certain QI chargers. It will charge through this case.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I've dropped my phone a few times and this thing has protected it 100%. However it ruins the pictures I take with the back camera cause it affects the sensor and aligns with the camera lens/flash not too perfectly. Kind of disappointing that I have to take the case off if I wanna get a clear shot of stuff.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: These cases have a defect that when you close the case the cover actually rests on the screen which will scratch glass of nexus
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: From reading the other reviews, Spigen must've have some production issues with a batch of these cases. I, unlike some of the unlucky others got a good one. So here's my impression of it-Pros:-Works with a Qi charger-Adds very little bulk-Cut-outs seem to line up perfectly-Tactile feedback on the buttons is the best I've ever had with any case before in the past-Feels like a very high quality productCons:-Honestly, I thought long and hard about this one and drew a blank.Overall in the past 5 years of having smartphones and buying 4-5 different cases each year, this is by far without question my favorite case I've ever bought. If you're on the fence about maybe it not working because of what the others said- remember that Amazon will take it back and pay you for the shipping no questions asked- DO IT- you won't regret it!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Power button is WAY WAY WAY too sensitive with this case.  Vol buttons are also a bit sensitive, o.w. seemes to be decent, but the two defects are just a killer, esp. power.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The case is less bulky than I thought it would be, which was a pleasant surprise. My first impression is very good. It looks like a lot of thought went into the design of the case in order to prevent your device from getting broken. The build quality looks great, especially for that price.Since it seemed to be an issue before, I will point out I had no problems with fitment. I popped it right into the case and all the buttons work fine.It does add bulk like any case will, but it doesn't add as much as I thought it would. It is a dual layer case with the inner soft TPU and the hard outer shell, so it was especially surprising. The texture is not totally smooth and slippery, but it is different than the soft touch material on the Nexus 5 itself. For me this was a plus, because it is easier to pull out of my pocket and doesn't collect small lint like the soft touch seems to.To summarize, it is definitely a case worthy of the Nexus 5.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I initially had the "power button" issue.  However, I fixed it not by scraping the black rubber protrusion from the inside but simply by using my finger to push out the power button cover with a little bit of force.  I pushed it out a bit without breaking it and now I no longer have any power button issues.The power button inner protrusion was a bit stiff but after some gentle pushing toward the outside of the case, the case now works as intended.I LOVE the gold color.  It looks tasteful, somewhat understated and not brass, which is a good thing.I give this case a 3 out of 5 because of 2 things: (1) the initial power button issue and (2) the case is a bit slippery.  A little of grippy texture would've been nice.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I recently purchased this Spigen Google Nexus 5 Case [Slim Armor] and it has fitment issues with the power buttons
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Case fits perfectly fine, my only issue with it is that the buttons do seem to be a little too sensitive and cause them to be pressed when just putting it in your pocket. There have been plenty of times where the phones has been muted and I missed calls because of this and also a couple of times where it just turned of and I am completely unaware of it until hours later when I want to check something online or just check my phone for updates. I have had to modify my behavior as far as handling my phone when putting it away and do it extra carefully, yet it still happens.  That is a bummer cause I really like the way the case feels around my phone.It's definitely of top quality materials, does not feel cheap, and the phones feels... well like its well protected. Works well with wireless charger, does not add too much bulk, and again it's of top quality materialp and feels like it.But based on the button issue is a bit of a bummer and I can't recommended as confidently as I would really want to for day to day use and that is precisely what a case should be used for (day to day protection of the phone).It goes so far as to I have been just using this case less and less specially for work were I am constantly receiving emails and phone calls I can't really miss. My alternative cheap case plastic/rubber case does not have that top quality look and feel but also does not have the button problem.  It's been a bitter sweet experience I hope they revise the button issue cause other than that this case is the best I have used on any of my phones.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Perfect case perfect fit. I have never heard of spigen till recently, I gave them a shot with this nexus 5 and I am pleasant pleased right now. I haven't gone all crazy for testing it, it's just a bumper. However even tho I say that the case actually was well made and the fit is tight with the right amount of grip in my hand.  When the galaxy s6 comes out I will probably buy from spigen.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The case is good, well at lease the sylicone but the plastic is very slippery, very disappointed!!! And I should got the black one instead!!!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Nothing flashy, adds a bit of bulk but added protection is worth it. Might consider getting it in another color, does what its supposed to, snug fit!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Provides great protection and is very slim. Fits the Nexus 5 perfectly. Allows you to place the phone face down but keeps the screen off whatever surface it is laying on. I also have the Slim Armor case for the iPhone 5 / 5S and it is equally impressive.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I want to give this case 5 starts but too bad the power and volume button are way too sensitive.First of all I have to say that the case is wonderfully made.I believe that this case will save my phone from a drop.I love the design and I love how slim and sleek it is without sacrificing protection.I went ahead and bought the white one. The storm-trooper look is definitely an eye catcher. I received a couple of compliments already when I had it on.So why do I only have this product at 3 stars? It's because there's problem on how the case fits. It renders the power and volume button to be super sensitive.The first time I tried the case on it was so tight that the phone just turns on and off. I did try fixing it a couple of times and by the 3rd time I was able to have the case fit without messing with the phone's power button, but like I stated above the power and volume button are way too sensitive.Overall I love this case but I might return it and just get another case. Too bad cause this case would have been an awesome case.*Update*I'm bumping this from 3 stars to 5. Spigen sent me a new and updated TPU soft case + a free screen protector (If only I knew, because I ordered their separate 3pcs screen protector. Ohh well.) Although it took a while for spigen's customer service to reply I still think they're one of the few companies out there that really value customer service; and for that I think they're awesome.The Slim armor is now my main case. I'm still using the old TPU soft case that I "fixed" by cutting and making it fit correctly. The new TPU case seem unresponsive compared to the old TPU case that I "fixed".Overall I'm happy with the product. I think Spigen's stuff are good and are high quality products.~Cheers
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This is my go to case so far for the Nexus 5. It fits great, offers plenty of protection, and doesn't TOO much bulk. Overall, a great case!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Despite all the negative reviews from people who couldn't get it to fit, I decided to buy this case...and I am so glad I didn't let my doubts get the best of me.  This case is absolutely gorgeous and it protects the phone well.  It feels like it's made of premium materials, and does not add a lot of bulk to my N5.Contrary to what others have said, there is a wonderful tactile feel when pressing the power / volume buttons.  The port and speaker holes are well designed.  Overall, this is perfect.Give it a try.  If you get one that's jacked up, Amazon will take it back free of charge and/or Spigen will work with you to make it right.  In the end I have no doubt you'll be happy with the product.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Great case as usual from Spigen, fits OK and given lovely look, price great as well, matt finish better than glossy
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought it because my GF loves gold, and she wanted even my phone in gold, in order to please her I order it, I love the look it actually looks nice, but the second layer is super thin, you have to put it together at the same time, I had a problem pressing the power button and I contacted amazon and they offer me a 30% discount nor the replacement of the part, so it was really bad... Still my GF loves it, but I'm not that happy...
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This is a very nice quality case.  It fits great, has good shock resistance, great lay on the table design, and last but not least looks great!  Also the rear does not disturb the flash.  If you like how it looks don't hesitate in getting it.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: had a ballistic one prior to getting spigen..ballistic was a bit too bulky and sticky.. but it does offer the BEST protection.spigen is incredibly smooth and just the right amount of protection.A phone should not be too bulky.. so spigen wins this one.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Overall the case is a good fit but there is no feel to the power or volume buttons. As a previous reviewer has pointed out, the power button does not line up right, and repeatedly powers the phone off. This makes the case completely unusable. Protection matters none if you can't actually use your phone. This is the 2nd Spigen phone I have purchased for my nexus 5 and so far, they are 0 for 2.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I already have three other Nexus 5 cases and this one has the best button feedback. It fits snug and feels pretty durable. However, the case is a little bulky and the bottom edges (around the charging port) are kinda sharp which can be a little irritating to touch. All in all, a very good case for the money. 4/5 stars.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I tried 4 different case models for my new Nexus, and this was my favorite.  The design seems pretty rugged, the build quality is good, and it's plain black so it doesn't try to stand out.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I Was Skeptical About Buying This Case Because Of The Reviews, But I Took My Chances Anyways. It Fits My Nexus 5 Perfectly. It May Be A Little Tight To Put On And Take Off But You Only Need To Do So Once I Assume. The Buttons Aligned Perfectly And There Was No Problems At All With The Volume Rocker Or Power Buttons. The Case Itself Is Fairly Thin Not Adding Much Bulk To The Phone And I Will Be Comfortable If I Accidentally Dropped My Phone With This Case On. (Not Really Lol) Great Case, Price Is Iffy But I Am Satisfied,
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I got this case along with 2 other slim cases, not sure which I'd want to use long-term. After trying all three, I quickly decided that the protection of this (slightly) bulkier case made it my choice. The design is good, and I like the polycarbonate shell inset. I also liked how it added a level of grip that the other cases did not (and the phone itself doesn't really, either).I used this case on my Nexus for around 2 weeks, and then started noticing that the polycarbonate shell was not fitting in the inset as well as it had at the start. For someone who is finicky about the fit and finish of things, this didn't sit well with me. It was as if the rubber part of the case fit exactly right, but the shell was slightly too large - it bowed out just a little from the rest of the case. When I ran my finger along the back of the phone, it would catch on the shell. It's only a couple of millimeters, probably, but it was enough that it bothered me.I tried removing the shell and bending it JUST slightly in the opposite direction, I even thought about gluing it, but I don't believe glue would hold it.  So ultimately, I switched to one of the other cases. As much as I like the design and extra protection of the Spigen Slim Armor case, the end result is I'm not using it on my phone.  If they can figure out a way to resolve that problem, I'd switch back to it in a heartbeat. So, if you aren't bothered by slight issues like that, I'd highly recommend this case.  If, though, you are slightly (or extremely, even) OCD, then this case might not be for you.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I replaced the official LG flip case from the Play Store with this case. The look & feel of that one was spot on, it just didn't protect well for the few drops I had.When I got this Spigen case, I immediately noticed how much much thicker it was than I could have expected. Not a fan of how it looks either. It really does look pretty awesome in the photos, just not what I expected in person. I can't stress how much bulkier the phone feels. This case is great for people with larger hands. It isn't that it is unusable, it is just so uncomfortable. I just don't think it's nearly as thin as the pictures make it out to be.My biggest gripe is that some of my chargers don't fit right when the case is on, where as ALL of them fit with the LG case. My phone was dead this morning as a result because I guess I didn't realize the USB cord wasn't pushed in all the way, or so I thought. Turns out that it eventually slips out after a short while. Thus, I really can't use this as a daily case. Maybe I'll slap it on when going hiking or camping or during a Zombie Apocalypse.I DO very much like that when the swivel door is open and behind the case, it doesn't cover the camera -- that was the primary reason I went with this Spigen case. You can see the clock through the window when the swivel door is closed and you push the power button, which is pretty cool. It looks like it will protect the phone very very well, I will definitely commend that.I haven't tried any third party apps so I have nothing to share about that. I don't think this case is terrible, its just not for me.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Excellent Case for my new phone, very strong and lightly!!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I'm not sure where Spigen got the definition of slim from, but it wasn't from any dictionary I am familiar with.  This case is simply a beast... by far the thickest, bulkiest case I've seen for the Nexus 5.  That said, it does what it was designed to do - protect your phone from a fall.  I suspect it may also stop bullets and allow you to bludgeon wildebeest should the need arise or the mood strike you.If you want the ultimate protection for your Nexus 5 and don't care about bulk, this case is for you!  Absolutely great for people who don't need to put their phones in their pockets. The one drawback is that the retaining surround will push up an edge-to-edge screen protector - if you have one on your phone, it will peel up.  Be prepared to either cut your screen protector down to size or run without one.If you want to throw your phone on the ground, drop it off buildings or the like, then you should consider this case. If you want a slim protector that you can't tell is there, steer clear.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I've got both, they're both great products, this one just feels a little more solid than the Neo Hybrid, to me.  I haven't had to test out the impact resistance of either case as I'm careful with my phone, but I'm quite pleased with my Spigen products and this one especially.  I think this one's just a bit more narrow than the Neo Hybrid, as well; it fits my dash mount with just a little extra space between the 'jaws' before I clamp it down.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I've owned several Spigen cases for various phones, I have never been let down with them. They protect well (I've dropped my phone enough now to attest to that) and look good. I've had several comments from people who own Otterbox cases that they love the look and how thin the phone + case still is.The ONLY drawback on this is that I feel the case is a bit harsh on my ear when I use my phone to make calls for an extended period of time. However, it just takes a moment to re-position the phone and all is well (that or use a headset).I'll continue to order Spigen cases for my devices!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The case itself is of great quality, but like others have reported before, the case has the power button issues
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I'm not going to write a long review, but I'll say I haven't had any issues with the power button and putting it on the phone was easy.  Not sure why people are having issues installing it?  The black case has great feel and grip, not slick and much better IMO than the neo hybrid.  Definitely happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this for the Nexus 5.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Update 2: After a lot of back and forth e-mails with Spigen support, I am no better off than I was before. Int he end, they basically told me to try taking the case off and putting it back on. All they did was waste my time. If you get a defective case, don't bother with Spigen support, just do an Amazon return. -4 starsUpdate 1: Spigen responded to this review very quicky and offered a replacement. Very good customer service.Original: I love the design of this case, but mine has some defects. Hopefully these aren't common.First is the plastic back that is warped noticeably outward. So when the phone is in the case, there's a lip between the tpu portion and the plastic. There's also a less noticeable warp along the left side near the screen. Lastly, there's a very small black spot in the plastic from the factory that won't come off.Otherwise, it's a great looking case. I've got to say, the buttons work very well. The best of any case that covers the buttons that I've ever had. 1
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I got mine today through amazon prime.  First thing I checked was the power button.  Mine was nice and soft, no problems with it shutting off the phone.  Only thing I did notice was a small square shaped scratch on the back that should not be there.  I love the look of the case, so this defect saddens me.  Also, the case itself is a bit slippery.  I would have preferred it to be a slight bit rougher so as to not feel slippery in the hand.I might also point out that I purchased several other cases which did not hit the mark at all.  This one and the I blason holster case that I bought for my husband are the only two worth keeping so far.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I used this about 2 months and the problems I discovered are that the white layer seemed to press slightly up against the power button hard enough in certain situations that would cause the phone to power off.  Also the inner black layer was very thin and I noticed some wear points in it especially around the power button.  In fact the case I had has a completely worn through spot next to the power button on the black liner.  Again it looks real nice but the power button problem made me have to replace it with something else.  I really cannot recommend it at this time.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This case fits well, provides good protection, and looks nice. All the ports and buttons line up good, the case installs easy and removes fairly easy also. It has good protection for everything but the front of the phone, but it does provide anti-shock drop protection to hopefully prevent glass damage from a corner drop. It doesn't really show finger prints in the white color, not sure about darker colors. For the price its a great solution for a case for the Nexus5.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: My son has this one for his phone.  he loves it but it is slippery but tough.  looks very nice but the neo case has nicer buttons
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Looks good, fits good, and a good price.Would be nice if Spigen made a flip case for the Nexus 5
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This is the case to use, it is very easy to install and protects the phone great. Well worth the cost for my Nexus 5
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: It's been about a week since I had this case and here's my opinion. When I first saw this case I thought it looked nice. But reading the reviews made me hesitant about buying it. So I bought it anyways and just waited and see if I was one of the "unlucky ones". When it arrived, I installed it right away. It was kinda tricky to put on but not to hard. Once I installed it, I waited to see if the case would make my Nexus 5 have problems with the power button... Nothing! yay! I was relieved.The case looks elegant (white case) and I had people asked me about the phone and the nice case. It feels fine in my hand, but it can be slippery. Also, it adds a little bulk and makes the phone feel heavier but that is to be expected on any case. I think this case will protect the phone from a minor drop.I'm happy with with my purchase and would definitely recommend it.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought this case along with theNeo HybridandGLAS.t NANO SLIM Tempered Glass Screen Protector. The glas.t fits very nicely with both cases, my friends don't even notice it's on. You do have to take care when installing it to have it fit right. If it's off by even a tiny bit the lip of the cases will start to peel up the edge of the protector. Also, there is just enough of a gap between the case and the protector that lint and dust can build up in an unattractive ring all the way around the screen. Qi charging works with both cases just as well as with the phone naked.I broke my Nexus 4 recently (dropped it without a case on) and was very disappointed by the aesthetics of the Nexus 5, possibly the ugliest product Google or LG have ever made. Enter Spigen. Both of the cases are very stylish and give the phone a much better feeling (not to mention, let it lay flat on a table ...geez LG, what were you thinking!) I actually prefer the subtle accent color and chrome buttons of the Neo Hybrid case, and don't feel like I'm giving up very much in protection. I'm used to an OtterBox commuter case, and both the Neo Hybrid and the Slim Armor feel more cosmetic than protective. Maybe smartphone case engineering has just advanced enough that we don't need very much bulk around a phone to protect it... I hope I don't find out.I have had no issues with button presses on either case, it seems Spigen has corrected whatever defect was reported in their first run of Nexus 5 cases. I read some complaints in other reviews about the cut-outs for the USB port and headphone jack being too small, I have not found this to be an issue at all for either case.I have alternated between both cases as my daily driver, and am pleased with the look and feel of both.However, I have a very low degree of confidence that either case would protect my phone against anything more than surface scratches. At the same time, I am reticent to take away stars because it *might* not work, so I have removed 1 star for my apprehension.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I really like the feel of this case and it seems to offer really good protection, my problem is it's just a bit too bulky for my liking. The phone fits in it perfectly and it fits in your hand ok, but sadly I feel like it doubles the thickness of the phone.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Like the appearance of the case but it adds too much bulk to a phone that shines on its small footprint.  The cutouts are accurate but the case material obstructs access to the slider and power button.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I have just received the case and it is not as red as it is in the picture shown. It is more of a bright neon orange rather than red. The product itself is pretty decent quality but the color is the biggest disappointment. The other big issue is the buttons themselves are very hard to press. I can not feel any feedback from the buttons when I press it. And I have to press it quite hard in order for it to register, a friend of mine has the gold version and it was awesome. But this product is far from it. Do not go for this one if you want a red one.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Excellent Case. I couldnt get my hands on a Red Nexus 5 so this case was my other alternative. I am liking it a lot.Has a great feel to it and also seems to have good drop protection.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This case is awesome.  It doesn't make the phone much bigger, and does an excellent job in protecting the camera and the screen from touching surfaces when laying flat (face up or face down). Buttons are "softer" but work fine.  My only slight gripe is that my headphones with larger plugs (M50s and 7506s) do not fit in the cut out, so I use a small 2 inch headphone extension that fits the bill.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought 3 different kind of Spigen cases. The Ultra slim and Neo Hybrid and this one. Ultra slim is definitely the thinnest one, it felt like almost not having a case, unfortunately it didn't cover the top and bottom screen, the parts where I feel the most vulnerable if I drop the phone. Neo Hybrid looks and feels very slick but it makes the phone felt really wide. The buttons were nicer on Neo Hybrid then this one. But overall, I like this case better. It reminded me of my Otterbox for my Blackberry. I supposedly received the newer version with the updated buttons, but they still feel very hard to press. I feel like this case can be a little thinner towards the back, but it does do a good job in protecting the phone.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Great cover design and protection wise. However it's a little bulky and it adds a little heft to the phone. My only complaint is that the back plastic part scratches very easily. A few weeks after purchase it started showing and 3 months in it didn't look pleasant anymore.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The Case is really nice and appears to have a quality feel to it. I gave this one 4 stars instead of 5 because of how the case doesn't respond to the 'power button' nor 'volume button' presses very well. You really have to use a lot of pressure to get the buttons to recognize they are being pressed.The shipping came amazon prime, which is how I do all my business. The quality of case is really nice and immediately was given several compliments.  The extra width isn't taking away from the candy-bar feel of the device. Overall 4 star is pretty good.  I would recommend this to a guy friend.  A girl friend, not so much as most of my girl friends want to be able to get to their power/volume buttons without any thought or extra pressure.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I like this case overall, compared to the ultra fit case is is much bigger.  The best comparison that I can think of is the OtterBox Commuter, it really reminds my of that type of case and protection.  I love the case overall, but I also have the power button problem now.  I have taken the case off and on several times to no avail.  It works fine with just the rubber on it, but once the outer shell goes on the button no longer has the feel it should.I made it into recovery mode on the Nexus putting this on the first time, so it was defiantly affected. For be the phone will stay on or off, but the button is "hard" and there is no feedback to pressing it like there should be.  Because it is hard the slightest touch is turning on the phone so I cannot keep using it this way.As a note on the size; is it is thicker than my S3 in a Diztronic case by 1mm or more, but it is close.  It is taller by 2-3mm vs the same phone.  It also appears huge compared to the Ultra Fit case for the Nexus, but there is much better protection for sure.I'll be using the Ultra Fit case I got from Spigen as it is working fine, but I normally prefer this type of case but they have a little work to don on this one for now anyway.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This is a very well made cover, it does not add any bulk or weight to the phone, and I can use with my leather case, it slides in the case with no problem. There was some mention of a problem with the power button, but it seems to work fine on mine, and I love the gold color!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Nice high quality case....
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Looks awesome, and protected my phone from a tumble off of my truck. However, daily usage scratched the tar out of it within a couple of weeks. By daily use, I mean the harsh conditions on a microfiber pouch in my backpack, and my trouser pockets at work. It looks and fits well, mostly. One more thing - the rubber sections doesn't suction to the phone, so the hard plate sometimes bubbles up, leaving a lip.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: So far the best case I've bought for my Nexus 5!  Very durable materials, gives my nexus a much more high-end look and feel.  The White doesn't get as dirty as I thought so that's a plus...all around excellent and durable case!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Good solid case. I like how slick it is so I can place it into my pocket easily. The case has lots of protection and feels like it will last! I had the black edition and it looks really nice.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This case looks great and fit perfectly on my Nexus 5.  There are not issue with it fitting over the buttons.  The buttons work just as well as with no case at all.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Not EXACTLY like no cover at all, but seriously the next best thing.  I didn't have the power button issue others had.  The case is very sturdy.  Fits well.  No gaps.  Haven't dropped the phone so not sure there.  But really easy to get the phone in and out.  No problems with attaching headphones or charger.  Every single good thing I could want in a phone case.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I bought this to replace the Neo Hybrid I was using.  I felt that case was a little too bulky.  This case is smaller and works just as well.  The phone has already survived several drops.  Wireless charging does work through the case, as least it does with my <$20 charger that I also bought on Amazon.  No complaints so far
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Flawed Case.. Power Button Cut-out issue.. Even If I hold phone in hand, it presses power button which presses on inner rubber casing. It become very annoying because it drains battery life even if phone is sitting in pocket. In addition, it already big phone, this case almost doubles the thickness. I recommend, hold purchase til Spiegen correct issue with existing case.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Case fits snug and looks amazing. I have read all of the reviews with the power button problems but I do not have that problem. Were the original cases TPU not sliced at the buttons? Mine has a small cut to it and that possibly may have been the fix for the case. Also many people are complaining about the edges being sharp. I don't think that the edges are sharp anywhere on the case at all. All in all it is a great feeling case that looks well and gives the phone more than enough protection from falls.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: Feels nice, fits perfect.  I like the back surface, it has tact but it stays clean/is easy to clean.  Fingerprints come right off and after weeks of use, there are still no scratches, blotches or discolorations/stains.  My real glass screen protector fits fine inside the dimensions of the case as well.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I love Spigen cases, I have one for my iPhone.  I got this one to use with my new Red Nexus 5.  I haven't taken it out of the box yet, because I am going to return it.  The problem is that the color is not really represented well.  It's not really red, but orange.  It's basically a REALLY bright fluorescent orange that is a bit more red.  I showed it to a few people today and asked them what color they thought it was, they all said orange!  It's a couple shades more towards red than a classic safety orange (and definitely fluorescent!) but still orange.  It clashes with the bright red of the Nexus 5, and it is waaay to bright for me to use.  I actually love the color, but it's just not for me in this application.  So beware!
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: My biggest problem with this case was the sharp edges at the bottom which may it uncomfortable to hold if you use your pinky finger to support the bottom, which I do. Due to this, I returned the case.However, the case itself looks very good and will definitely protect your phone in a drop. It does add bulk, but the amount is acceptable for the level of protection that you are getting.My case did not have any problems with the power button described in other reviews.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: I ordered one of these before I received my Nexus 5. I was one of the unlucky ones that got the poor fitting case. I didn't want to go caseless so I modified (aka cut the plastic clam shell) so the case would be usable. I of course guessed wrong and modified the wrong part, since it was the TPU that was the issue.Spigen was pretty quick to get me a replacement sent out and included a screen protector for my troubles and you really can't expect any more than that. However, I'm still left with a bit of a sour taste because I had to modify the case to make it usable in the meantime and now I'm left with part of my case that has been cut on, again not really their fault, but it was my only option to have a case also.The case is actually a nice case if you are familiar with an Otterbox Commuter this is very comparable to that, but not as bulky. With the replaced TPU the buttons function nicely. I have dropped my phone once on concrete and had no issue and the case did not damage either.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The case would be great if it didn't constantly press down upon the power button. Makes it unusable since the phone keeps turning off and back on as soon as you put it in this case. Tried several times to remove the phone and put it back, no luck. Didn't want to try adjusting the case using force and simply asked for a refund.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: The wife is 4'11", and she dropped the phone from a small height. The phone case split in half, and our brand new Nexus 5 had it's screen shattered into a million pieces.Pros:- It looks great. This is actually a beautiful case.Cons:- It didn't actually protect our investment. We will not be purchasing a product from this company again. A cheap $5 Chinese case would've protected it better.Disappointing. :(
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: This case is great! The color is a bright red (specifically Coquelicot) the photos and monitor viewing on may show it to be more darker than it really is.It is easy enough to put on, and take off, and the feet on the back help keep the back clean and scratch free.The buttons are my biggest issue with most cases, either they are solid and you have to guess if you pushed it or not, or they are just cut from the case, and you have to jab your finger in the cutout to push them, sadly this is the latter (hard to push). This is the main reason for the 4/5.It is still a VERY sturdy case, and has a purpose for nights out where a bumper, or TPU may not be enough.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Smooth Black (SGP10569)

reviewText: nice case. i prefer the diztronic voyeur case though as it is a smaller case. this case is good though if you dont mind the bit of extra bulk
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: Great case and design. Just a bit bulky for the size of devicePros:DesignCons:A bit too bulky
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This case works good, looks good and works with my wireless charger, have not dropped phone, so I do not know how it holds up.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: Very nice looking case for the Nexus 5. The volume rocker is slightly off so sometimes there's issues with turning the volume up/down. The power button works great although slightly more sensitive than without case. With the case on, the phone feels quite a bit wider.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: I am not a fan of adding bulky cases to phones, but I decided I needed a little more protection on my phone. I opted for this one based on price and brand.  I am very happy with the case. Great protection and makes the phone easier to hold somehow despite the extra size.  Great blend of looks, protection, size, and price.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: The case is good. Although it may be hard at times to remove.  Other than that, I have no complaints
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: The photos look cool but the actual product is huge!  Makes the Nexus 5 feels almost like a Samsun Note 3.I've tried using in several times but finally give up.  The original back of the Nexus 5 is pretty scratch resistant, so I just use it naked, except for the screen protector.  This way it actually make the phone more unique.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This is the 3rd case I've tried for my Nexus 5. I've also had i-Blason SoftGel Flexible TPU Case and the Spigen Ultra Hybrid. It's definitely the best case out of the 3, however, it also cost twice as much as the others and...suffers from similar inadequacies as the other 2 cases:Pro's:- Not too big or bulky, but I certainly wouldn't call it a slim case.- Good elevated lip around screen/bezel for laying phone on flat surfaces.- This is the first case I've used that hasn't caused my dbrands front skin to move or separate from the surface (you really need tohave the skin on the phone for several days to allow it to properly adhere before putting a case on)- Definitely solid feeling as far as back surface and side/edge protection is concerned.Con's:- It's a bit of a PITA to put on the phone just right.- USB port is not sufficiently large to accommodate bigger aftermarket USB cables (nothing a light trim with a razor blade on theUSB cable couldn't fix).- Headphone port too small for many types of headphones (My Audio-Technica ATH-M30's don't fit).
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: I really like the protection it offers, but compared to others TPU and the Official nexus 5 bumper case from google it is a tad larger.Pros:Nice looking designGood value for the moneyGood Protectionsresponsive buttonsgood fitCons:A tad larger (which might offer a better protectionthe buttons are too sensitive (which might be a good things for other people)
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: i keep ordering cases, trying to find the perfect one, yet, i keep coming back to this one. its reliable, durable, and just looks damn good.bit sharp on the hand if you have a death grip on your phone like i usually do. "my precious"
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: beautiful design and fits comfortably in my handcant go wrong with spigen and the material is more than adequate
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This two part case fit perfectly. No trouble put on or take off. button are fully responsive. A good fit at a good price.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This case fits the nexus 5 really snugly. I mean really snugly. If you're fine with that, this case is awesome. All the cutouts are perfect and the plastic band doesn't chip easily. The gold color also matches the nexus 5 pretty well. Earphones have no problem fitting in the jack. I have SOL republic ones and they fit with no problems. (They have an L shaped plug)
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: I ordered this after using the Caseology bumper/cover for about 5 months. While the Caseology cover had a great grip and protection feel, it added a lot of size to the device and had horrible access to the buttons. I often found myself frustrated when trying to quickly unlock the phone or change volume.After a lot of research I ordered this case in Gold. I saw some people comment about how there need to be instructions on how to put the  cover on, I just slid my phone in as I would with any other bumper/cover and it fit fine. The biggest difference I notice is how easy it is to use the buttons. It looks premium, like something that costs twice as much. It still maintains the phone's slim profile and does not add any bulk to it.The last pro is also a con. It does not give a sturdy feel and seemed to slip out of my hands a couple of times in the past week.Overall it is a great looking case.Update: Reduced 1 star. Noticed a Huge flaw, has a very small opening at the headphone jack.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: I really like this case (and my Nexus 5).  I was shocked when I first saw the color as it was nothing like what was shown in the picture.  Instead of being a dark rich red it’s like bright fluorescent red/orange with even a hint of pink mixed in.  The case I had on my old phone was a nice deep orange with black so I don’t have issue with bright colors (makes it easier to find my phone), but this was nowhere near what I expected.  Color aside, I really like the way the case functions.  It fits really well, it works with my wireless charger, and the button function feels really good too.  Nice crisp response, and not mushy at all.  I may also try one of the other colors for a more subdued look.  Getting it on was a bit tricky, especially as there were no instructions. I put the rubber on the phone first and then fit the color ring.  To take it off, I just started at a corner and pressed the assembly off.  If I had one gripe, it would be that the headphone hole doesn’t fit the 3.5mm to 3.5mm stereo wire I got with my Nuforce MMP headphone amp, and I can’t find another short one (8” or less) with a step-down.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This is my 2nd Spigen Neo Hybrid case. The first one I bought (for the Galaxy S4) was returned and given a 1-star review because of it's ill fit and small accessory (headphone, usb) ports.This case has resolved all the issues noted for the S4 case, except for one: the headphones port is still too small. None of my headphones (Sennheiser 598, Audiotechnica M50) fit, so I have to remove the case when using them.It's an inconvenience, but the quality of the case is so nice that I'll deal with it.I give this case 4 stars. If the headphone port were bigger, it'd be 5 stars.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This case fits perfectly.  It is a bit challenging to remove as other reviewers have mentioned, but if you remove it the correct way, its no big deal.  (You remove it starting from the bottom corners.)  Overall it feels good in the hand, and doesn't add very much bulk to the phone at all.
title: Nexus 5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Series for Nexus 5 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10562)

reviewText: This is an excellent case, it's very slim and it's perferct for my Nexus 5.I bought it because i wanted a slim case and to have a small protection against falls.
