reviewText: this case is great. durable, and even protected the phone from a pretty high fall onto concrete about a month after putting it on.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: This is a 2-Part case that will double the size of your phone. But WOW! does it feel sturdy. Once you put it on, you won't want to take it off.If you're like me and carry a spare battery (rather than a bulky portable battery pack), changing the battery is not something you can do on the fly.I like it, but I need to be able to change my battery frequently because of the demands I put on my phone. I'll be getting a different case, something a little slimmer that's quick on/off, but I think this case looks pretty cool.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: The case seemed very thin, and I didn't like the two part application of the rubber body and plastic edge. It aesthetically pleasing, but I'm afraid if I dropped my phone it would easily crack. If you're as accident prone as me dropping your phone all the time, I would recommend the brand Urban Armor Gear. Even putting the case on and taking it off I felt I would accidentally break it, I returned it the same day and got my UAG as soon as possible.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: The review has been updated 30 days after my purchase.  The cut outs for the charger cord are not big enough.  The plug for the charger tweeks the case causing it to eventually break.  It was a nice looking case while it lasted.  Re-rated from 5 to 1 star.----------------- original review -------------------------If you want an open face case protector, this one is hot!1) Cutouts:  All are good, and the headphone cutout is especially large! 5 of 5 stars2) Protection: The black part is almost a firm rubber and the colored ring is plastic. It has two layers of protection on the edge. Further, the edge is raised to help protect the face of the phone as well. 5 of 5 stars.3) Fit: The fit is nothing short of perfect. 5 of 5 stars.4) Look and feel: Wow, its really nice! 5 of 5 stars
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: The only drawback bring out the difficulty of infidelity
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: i always buy this case regardless of what phone i own, wished they offered them for the tablets as well! combo with the tempered glass, it is a must! very sleek and slim, doesn't add much bulk, and enough protection for your everyday usage! highly recommend it! great buy!
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: I love the way this phone cover fits my Galaxy S5.  The outer part of the case is plastic but looks like aluminum.  Its very sleek looking and does not make my thin phone look bulky.  All of the cut outs for this phone were perfectly placed, exposing only those parts of the phone that need to be exposed.  My other option for a phone case was an Otterbox Symetry Series ($39.95).  Since it was going to be release later than I was going to have my phone AND is was double the price of this case, i decided to give Spigen a shot.  I'm very happy with my decision, this product has met my expectations.  The only complaint I have is that it can me kind of difficult to remove the usb charger cover from the phone with this case, this is where the otterbox symetry has an upper hand.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: I love this case. it is by far the best Galaxy case out there. I have been through many different ones and nothing comes close to this.Not only it is beautiful with a great design but its very comfortable in the hand and pocket.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: I'm interested in purchasing an S5, but I came here first to see if they had a case available before hand...that's how much I love the case I have on my Galaxy S4 right now. Since they do, I'm sold on upgrading to an S5...Update 6/24/14: I've had this case on my S5 for a couple months now and had to come back to edit my review. I actually dropped it to a 4 star instead of a 5 star. One major difference between the S5 over the S4 is the charging port has a sealed cover over it for waterproofing reasons. With this case, they didn't leave enough room for me to open the charging cover without either removing the case or using a paperclip or something similar. Small annoyance, and those with smaller fingers or long nails might not have this issue, but figured it was worth sharing.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: Clearly a quality product but too bulky for the phone in question. Also the rear of the case is too slippery and doesn't provide enough grip.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: The Spigen Neo Hybrid is lightweight, classy, and tough case that fits the Galaxy S5 perfectly.  So long Otterbrick, hello Spigen!  My only complaint was that installation instructions were not included in the packaging.  Installation is a breeze, as this is only a 2 piece case.  (I found a great vid on You Tube, so no biggy.)  Get this case.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: I really like the look and feel of this case.  However, it's much bulkier than I expected.  Reading the other reviews, I was expecting it to be very slim.  Now, granted, it is slim, but in order to achieve proper protection, it is going to add bulk to your phone.  This adds enough bulk to make the phone a little awkward to operate.  It also adds a fair amount of weight to it.  Occasionally, I will take my phone out of the case, and it's like falling in love with how thin my phone is without the case.The headphone jack I use in my car to hook up to my stereo is a little tight, but it fits.  I have a couple charging cables that will not fit this case, because they are too thick.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: Better than any case I have ever had the buttons are just like they are with it off no need to push hard like with most.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: Initially i received one spigen case for Galaxy s5. It looked very similar to this one. I believed it was the same which i ordered from amazon but shipped from China. I was not at all impressed by the case. But later , in couple days i receieved this case. This case is totally different then the china one. Though there are lots of similarities but the finishing and details are very obvious. There were some issues with china version. The flap doesnt open as there was not much room for finger, the back dots were very big and it doesnt look good,the camera and flash cuts are too big, speaker cut was  not perfect. Overall all cuts were not perfect. The surrounding bumper was also looked cheap. Overall please buy genuine spigen case to avoid all these frustrations. Genuine one is a clear winner in all details.though little thick but you always had case then its not a matter. I never had my phones in cases. So it looks little heavy for me.Any how i happily recommend this case.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: The case feels great in your hand and is light and protective. The protruding silver buttons ultimately made me send it back however. I was annoyed by the buttons triggering unexpected wake ups and pocket dials. Using this case requires password screen protection to keep unwanted unlocks from happening. I echo others reviewers criticism that the buttons feel cheap to the touch although this did not affect responsiveness. If fact the buttons may do too good a job based on my earlier criticism. I recommend a case with cut-outs for the buttons. Since the s5 is water resistant you needn't worry about leaks.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: The fit is slim and fits great. No issues with charging port or headphones. Thought it might be bulky but works great, recommend this for any S5 owner.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: This is a very nice case. Love the look and feel. this case is not a heavy duty case but is very light weight and does not increase the size of the phone by much.  Very nice and love the metallic look buttons. Nice quality.

title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: This is one of the best cases I ever had. Fully protects the phone, and the heart rate monitor does work!!!! either you have to big of fingers for it to scan your finger or you are doing it to hard. it also comes with directions on how to use it!!!!
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: This case is great - it is priced decently and it does what it says, for the most part. It protects the phone well, and it's you don't get fingerprints on it like all the other cases.The case has two parts to it - it has the main case which I give 5 out of 5 for, it's brilliant. The second part is a strip that goes all the way around the "edge" of the phone. This part I'd say is a 3 or 4 out of 5. Once it is on, there seems to be a gap between this piece and the main piece. If you're picky like I am, it can get annoying. Not a big deal overall I guess.I'll definitely look for Spigen products when I need a case of any sort again.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: I bought this case because of the reviews.  i beleive it provides adequate protection and it looks nice for a reasonable price.  It is thin and makes it easier for me to carry my phone in my pocket.
title: Galaxy S5 Case, Spigen Neo Hybrid Case for Galaxy S5 - Retail Packaging - Satin Silver (SGP10771)

reviewText: Very good product and it looks a great fit for the phone. I am unable to give the full 5 stars as somehow I feel the case adds a bit of bulk to the phone and is a little over priced. I do hope this extra bulk gives the extra protection for my G3. I have the Gunmetal color.Probably would have given 5 stars if the pricing was $9.99.
title: LG G3 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for LG G3 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10866)

reviewText: I had this same case a year or so ago for the Galaxy s4. Back then I didn't like it, but my reasons were small enough to at least give it a shot on the LG G3 since there aren't a whole lot of quality options. Every complaint I had about the s4's case design has been fixed. This is super comfortable to hold in your hand, has a great premium feel, and the cutouts for all the ports have allowed every charger and pair of headphones I have tried so far. It's probably the best case available right now for the LG G3, and even when there is more competition it will probably remain one of the best.
title: LG G3 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for LG G3 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10866)

reviewText: I really like this case! No cut outs!!! Be aware to purchase through SPIGEN!Its a sleek case, its fits really good the G3. It could have more grip in the back though. Other than that, I am very pleased with this case!
title: LG G3 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for LG G3 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10866)

reviewText: I have this LG case for my daughters G3 phone. She is forever dropping her expensive phones. She has been so glad I picked this one out for her, because she dropped her phone outside of a café and the phone was totally protected when it hit the concrete parking lot. She has been telling everyone this is the best phone case since. Now all she wants to do is decorate the case her way.
title: LG G3 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for LG G3 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10866)

reviewText: Purchased this case for my new Metallic Black AT&T; LG G3 and I must say that it's an attractive case for the phone.Pros:- All around protection for the LG G3- Cut out for the charging port, mics, headphone jack, IR port, camera, flash and buttons are perfect.- Little to no bulk added to the phone dimensions- Screen protector can be applied without interference- Gunmetal color matches the front lower bezel color on the Metallic Black version of the phoneCons:- Depending on your Micro USB cable, it might not plug in due to the cutout for the port (if using other than the provided Micro USB that came with the phone)- The back cover might be slippery to hold for others- The back cover might be prone to scratches in the long runI guess I'm one of the lucky ones that got a case meant for the US model (no cutout on the corner) and one of the things I wish I could comment is if the case could work through a wireless charging cover (which I was supremely disappointed that the US version does not include).Overall it's a great case that is easy to apply and is fairly priced for the quality and construction.
title: LG G3 Case, Spigen Slim Armor Case for LG G3 - Retail Packaging - Metal Slate (SGP10866)
